item.title: 10 seconds before logging out of combat?
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

Like I said before…

  public boolean Hit(int index) {
    if(server.playerHandler.players[index] == null) return false;
    int BonusUsed = CheckBestBonus();
    int enemyDef = server.playerHandler.players[index].playerBonus[BonusUsed+5] +(server.playerHandler.players[index].playerLevel[1] / 4);
    int myBonus = playerBonus[BonusUsed] +(playerLevel[0] / 4);
    if(misc.random(myBonus) > misc.random(enemyDef)) {
      return true;
    }
    return false;
  }

called in AttackPlayer method

		if (p.Hit(Player)){
			hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
		}else{
			hitDiff = 0;
		}

this method takes 2 players both who are fighting or player vs npc doesn’t matter… and adds up all the bonus’s
lets say one player has bonus 2000 other has 1500. than it uses random function to randomly pick a number 0-2000 for 1 player and 0-1500 on the other player… the one with the biggest random number gets to hit the other player… or he hits 0…

so the 2000 def vs 1500 def won’t matter both random numbers will be randomly high so it won’t matter its all random…

if you have 1 def and other player had 0 def… you would have a 50% chance of getting hit while other person would have 100% chance of getting hit unless the hit damage is 0.

Read full topic
